Usage

Installation

To use Lumache, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ git clone https://github.com/Howardhuang98/BNSL-doc.git

Load DataFrame

use pandas

Choose your favorite estimator

Hill climb search estimator. It greedily search possible operations based on hill climb strategy. It is the most common used score-based algorithm.

class bnsl.estimators.HC(data)

Greedy hill climb estimator

Dynamic planning estimator. It exhaustively searches every state graph, then uses shortest path algorithm to find optimal order, finally recover the optimal DAG from order.

class bnsl.estimators.DP(data)

Dynamic program estimator class reference: 《Learning Optimal Bayesian Networks: A Shortest Path Perspective》 :param: data, np.array or pd.Dataframe
